thread.title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger not as good tactically as Harry Redknapp, claims Paul Merson | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger not as good tactically as Harry Redknapp, claims Paul Merson | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Arsene Wenger not as good tactically as Harry Redknapp, claims Paul Merson | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 7:45 am Arsene Wenger or Harry Redknapp? (Picture: Getty) ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The north London club were thumped 5-1 by Bayern Munich at the Allianz Arena on Wednesday night and Wenger has faced enormous criticism in the aftermath of the Champions League last-16 clash. 
Germany and Bayern legend Oliver Kahn stressed that he had ‘never seen a team play as badly as Arsenal’ and Merson, who made 327 appearances for the Gunners, hit out at Wenger ahead of the tie. 
‘I don’t think tactically he [Wenger] is as great as people say,’ Merson told talkSPORT. Paul Merson has slammed his former manager Arsene Wenger (Picture: Getty) 
‘I played under Harry Redknapp and people go, ‘Oh, Harry Redknapp, a wheeler and dealer’, and that is so disrespectful.
